name: Block Fruit Puzzle
description:
Play and enjoyBlock Fruit Puzzle game for free! Download today and join the fantastic sugary adventure in the Fruitland! Here comes the new adorable block puzzle mania game.
Features:
-It looks easy. However, it is not easy as you thought.
-This is a fun puzzle game.
-Many fruit for Tile Matching , you can pick what you need .
- It is a competitive game, you can challenge with your friends.
- You can sign players To score and rank your competition.
- Colorful and simple design.
